N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 701.12 - Decision, report and recommendation

State Regulations

The hearing officer shall render a decision or report and
recommendation, in writing, which shall contain a statement of the issues, the
findings of fact, the conclusions of law and the reasons therefor. If a report
and recommendation is rendered, the commissioner shall adopt, reject or modify
the hearing officer's recommendation and a final order and decision shall
thereupon be entered and filed with the Secretary to the department, unless the
commissioner directs that further proceedings be held. If the commissioner
issues a decision that includes findings of fact and conclusions of law which
conflict with the findings and conclusions recommended by the hearing officer, the commissioner shall set forth in writing the reasons
therefor. Notes
